meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Darren Shea Pauline Sholtys Kristin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7026.

td.p: Darren Shea, a network administrator from Kyle, Texas
Pauline Sholtys, an editor from Ansonia, Connecticut
Kristin Sausville, a stay-at-home mom from Newark, Delaware (whose 3-day cash winnings total $52,802)

tr.td: THEY SAID IT
BY ANY OTHER NAME
THE BUCK STOPS HERE
BODY PART VERBS
SPORTS JEOPARDY
GETTING HITCHED
(Alex: We'll give you the onname of one of the partners, you identify the other.)
